name: Asteroids... But Roguelite
description:
Gameplay


  • Start with a fragile ship with a simple weapon.
  • Defeat ever increasing enemies to gain money.
  • Spend that money in the shop to purchase various upgrades for your ship.
  • Roll quests that reward you with bonus money or sometimes even improve your various abilities.
  • Encounter randomized bosses and defeat them to continue progressing.

Features

  • Over 40 unique power-ups
  • Over 30 enemies types
  • 7 unique bosses
  • Achievements
  • Online Leaderboard
